editorial.line1: 25 simple questions. Just a few minutes.
editorial.line2: Based on established psychology. One of 16 personality profiles.
editorial.line3: Practical insight into your strengths and blind spots.

Test.tip: Tip: answer intuitively — there are no wrong answers.

Pay.description: You will get a complete Big Five personality profile: the percentage score for each trait and a short interpretation.

unlock.title: What exactly do I unlock?
unlock.text: A full report of the five traits with short tips on how to use your strengths.

once.title: Is it one-time?
once.text: Yes. Pay once and get instant access to the result.

demo.title: This is a simulation
demo.text: This button launches a demo — no real payment.

noData.title: No data
noData.text: I can't see saved results. Return to the test and answer the questions.

hero.sub: Result based on established personality research

bigFive.note: Computed from Big Five traits → mapped into one of 16 personality profiles
bigFive.title: Big Five breakdown
bigFive.subtitle: Scores are normalized to 0–100. Bars show relative intensity.
bigFive.inverseNote: Note: “Emotional stability” is the inverse of Neuroticism (100 − N).

Result.disclaimer: This assessment is based on established personality research and provides informational insight — it is not a clinical or diagnostic tool.

Questions.E1: I find it easy to start conversations with new people.
Questions.E2: After a long day, I prefer socializing over being alone.
Questions.E3: I often take the initiative in a group.
Questions.E4: I feel comfortable being the center of attention.
Questions.E5: I usually prefer listening rather than talking.
Questions.O1: I enjoy trying new ideas, even if they are unconventional.
Questions.O2: I'm drawn to abstract topics (ideas, philosophy, the future).
Questions.O3: I get bored with routine and look for variety.
Questions.O4: I value creativity more than tradition.
Questions.O5: I prefer proven methods over experimentation.
Questions.C1: I usually plan tasks and stick to the plan.
Questions.C2: Deadlines matter to me, and I actively protect them.
Questions.C3: I like having things organized and structured.
Questions.C4: I finish what I start, even when motivation drops.
Questions.C5: I often do things at the last minute.
Questions.A1: It's easy for me to understand other people's perspective.
Questions.A2: Warmth and respect in relationships are important to me.
Questions.A3: In conflict, I prefer compromise over winning.
Questions.A4: I often support others, even when it's not convenient.
Questions.A5: I can be blunt, even if it hurts someone's feelings.
Questions.N1: I get stressed easily, even by small things.
Questions.N2: It's hard for me to calm down after an unpleasant situation.
Questions.N3: I often worry ahead of time.
Questions.N5: I usually stay calm under pressure.

sensitive.label: Sensitive Reactor
sensitive.note: You pick up signals quickly. Under pressure you may feel intensity — recovery time matters.

steady.label: Steady Stabilizer
steady.note: You stay relatively calm in stress. You recover quickly and keep a clear head.

empathicVisionary.label: Empathic Visionary
empathicVisionary.note: Creativity plus people-awareness. You want solutions that are smart and human.

independentInnovator.label: Independent Innovator
independentInnovator.note: Big ideas plus tough standards. You challenge assumptions and cut through noise.

supportivePragmatist.label: Supportive Pragmatist
supportivePragmatist.note: Practical approach plus warmth. You stabilize situations and protect relationships.

directRealist.label: Direct Realist
directRealist.note: Concrete thinking plus blunt honesty. You value results, clarity, and efficient action.

driveDeliver.label: Drive & deliver
driveDeliver.note: You move quickly from talk to execution. You like pace and closing loops.

planPerfect.label: Plan & perfect
planPerfect.note: You work best with structure and deep focus. Quality and correctness are your strengths.

exploreAdapt.label: Explore & adapt
exploreAdapt.note: You generate momentum by trying things. You iterate fast and learn through action.

flowImprovise.label: Flow & improvise
flowImprovise.note: You prefer flexibility and spontaneity. You do best when you can respond in the moment.

P01.name: Strategic Thinker
P01.desc: Long-term focus, systems thinking, clarity over chaos.

P06.name: Reflective Idealist
P06.desc: Driven by authenticity and inner values.
